name: Snake VS Bomb
overview: TND Games is very proud to present to you an entry for the Snake Fun Compo on CSDB. Snake VS Bomb is a fun for five minutes hi score challenge that features the following: 8 Levels of increasing speed Addictive gameplay Loading bitmap Front end presentation Hi score table Arcade style sound effects and cool music Plus much more. PAL/NTSC compatible Compatible with theC64 mini, theC64, full size and theVIC20 This is a fun hi score attack challenge, featuring 8 levels of madcap mayhem. You are a snake, which is traveling through a very long tunnel. During your travels you encounter fruit and bombs, which are placed at random inside the tunnel. The snake can eat the fruit if the fruit reaches its head for points. However, the bombs must be avoided. If any part of the snake collides into a bomb (or vice-versa), the bomb will explode along with the snake. The game will then be over.
